channel.title: Hellgate London
channel.description:
FPS Online RPG, anyone?
I'm thinking of buying Hellgate. If you have played it before please give me your opinion on the game because I don't want to end up wasting my money.
Here's a GIF of some of the gameplay: [img]http://www.novatek.com.au/images/dx10/hellgate.gif[/img]
I've seen some of my friends playing it and so far it looks pretty good. I just need to get some more info on the game.
FYI: This was created by a part of the ye old Diablo team. So that's just a good boost for my thoughts on this game.
~Dizzy
